attributes.action: Lower the UK retirement age STOP increasing it.
attributes.additional_details: What's the retirement age for politicians? With millions in their pots. Guarantee it's not high 60s or anywhere near. This is a joke and needs to be addressed why should we give as many years of our life working paying government tax when they fail us left right and centre
attributes.background: Why should we work until there near enough dead. Why is it state pension age is going up. so UK government clearly just want people to work as long as possible to pay as much tax as we can then when we retire have as little amount of years as possible claiming state pension is that right?
